jobs.title: Senior Frontend Developer
jobs.description:
## About the Role

We're looking for an experienced Frontend Developer to join our growing team. You'll be working on cutting-edge web applications using Vue.js and modern web technologies.

### Requirements

- Strong experience with Vue.js and its ecosystem (Vuex, Vue Router)
- Proficient in TypeScript and modern JavaScript (ES6+)
- Experience with responsive design and CSS preprocessors
- Understanding of web performance optimization

### Tech Stack

- Vue.js 3
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Vite
- Jest for testing

jobs.title: Backend Engineer
jobs.description:
## Role Overview

We are seeking a Backend Engineer to help build and maintain our scalable APIs and microservices.

### Key Responsibilities

- Design and implement RESTful APIs
- Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code
- Collaborate with frontend developers
- Optimize application performance

### Required Skills

- Node.js and TypeScript expertise
- Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases
- Understanding of API design principles
- Knowledge of Docker and containerization

jobs.title: Digital Marketing Manager
jobs.description:
## About the Position

We're looking for a Digital Marketing Manager to lead our online marketing initiatives and drive growth.

### Key Responsibilities

- Develop and execute digital marketing strategies
- Manage social media presence and content calendar
- Optimize SEO and SEM campaigns
- Analyze marketing metrics and prepare reports

### Required Skills

- Proven experience in digital marketing
- Strong analytical and strategic thinking
- Experience with marketing automation tools
- Knowledge of SEO/SEM best practices

jobs.title: Content Writer
jobs.description:

jobs.title: Product Designer
